welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Millbury, where history meets modernity! Get ready to explore our picturesque town known for its beautiful parks, delicious local cuisine, and friendly community. Enjoy your stay and discover all that Millbury has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Worcester Regional Airport serves all commercial flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at North Central Airport, serving regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
